meanings.sent1: The wearer of the crown looked very regal.
meanings.sent2: The wearer of the glasses could see clearly now.
meanings.sent3: The wearer of the funny hat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: She was the wearer of many hats in the office, taking on various roles.
meanings.sent5: The wearer of the badge proudly displayed their achievement.

meanings.definition: A person who wears clothes or accessories.
meanings.sent1: The wearer of the red dress stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The wearer of the watch was always on time.
meanings.sent3: The wearer of the superhero cape saved the day.
meanings.sent4: He was the wearer of the team jersey, showing his support.
meanings.sent5: The wearer of the necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
